cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on August 30, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4133, Caribbean Basin Security Initiative Authorization Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 110 (Thursday, June 24, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ESPAILLAT:
H.R. 4133.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8:
To make all Laws which shall be necessary and proper for
carrying into Execution the foregoing Powers, and all other
Powers vested by this Constitution in the Government of the
United States, or in any Department or Officer thereof.
[Page H3134]

latestAction.text: Star Print ordered on the bill.

title: Caribbean Basin Security Initiative Authorization Act
